code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/user/login",{email});if(res.data.success){if(res.data.user.role==="student")navigate("/student-dashboard");else navigate("/teacher-dashboard");}}catch(err){alert("Login failed");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,style:{margin:"2rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"})]});}export default Login;
